title: Extend a CAPA Due Date
description: The team investigating a CAPA needs more time for their root cause analysis. A manager needs to approve an extension.

tasks.description: Locate the CAPA request that needs an extension.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the open CAPA in the system.

tasks.description: Review the reason provided for the extension request.
tasks.expected_outcome: Manager reviews the notes about needing to perform additional testing.

tasks.description: Approve the extension and set a new due date for the investigation phase.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent updates the CAPA with the new due date and logs the approval.
